class.name: Artificer
class.shortfluff: Through the use of cryptic magical formulas and complex alchemical recipes, you channel arcane power into items that empower your allies and hinder your enemies
class.fluff: Artificers treat mastery of magic like a technical skill. They see patterns in energy and matter, and they understand how to manipulate the flow of magic in and around objects and creatures. Artificers channel energy into items using magical components, diagrams, and complex chains of sigils. Their skills let them assemble a magic device for any situation.
